g.text: Weight in Bhori | ржнрж░рж┐ ржПржХржХрзЗ ржУржЬржи

svg.text: тЬУ Traditional Islamic green, gold, blue gradients
тЬУ Bengali font integration (Noto Sans Bengali)
тЬУ Cultural card design with proper contrast
тЬУ Authentic Arabic text with transliterations
тЬУ Islamic terms in Bengali context (ржирж╛ржорж╛ржЬ, ржпрж╛ржХрж╛ржд)
тЬУ Ramadan and Hijri calendar awareness
тЬУ Bottom tab navigation with Bengali labels
тЬУ Smooth state transitions and highlighting
тЬУ Rich content cards with multiple data points
тЬУ Daily Islamic content (Quran, Hadith, Dua)
тЬУ Live metal prices for Zakat calculation
тЬУ Prayer streak and progress tracking
тЬУ Islamic calendar and date integration
тЬУ Proper Islamic references and citations
